tasks.instruction: Read and analyze the uploaded F1 documentation file at /workspace/uploads/F1-Real-Time-Analytics-Engine-Complete-Documentation.md and the AWS F1 page at https://aws.amazon.com/sports/f1/. Create a comprehensive Product Research Document that includes: 1) Analysis of existing F1 data and capabilities, 2) AWS F1 features analysis (Race Strategy, Competitor Analysis, Car Performance), 3) Feature requirements for our own implementation, 4) Competitive analysis comparing AWS approach vs our approach, 5) Market research on F1 analytics applications. Save the output to /workspace/docs/prd/f1_analytics_prd.md

Based on the PRD at /workspace/docs/prd/f1_analytics_prd.md and the original documentation at /workspace/uploads/F1-Real-Time-Analytics-Engine-Complete-Documentation.md, design a complete system architecture for the F1 Real-Time Analytics Engine. Include: 1) Overall system architecture diagram, 2) Component design for Race Strategy module, 3) Component design for Competitor Analysis module, 4) Component design for Car Performance module, 5) Data flow architecture, 6) Technology stack recommendations, 7) Integration points with existing F1 data sources. Save the system design to /workspace/docs/design/f1_system_design.md
